title.rendered: Top Angular Development Companies for Hiring Angular Developer

content.rendered:
The digital world has increased the demand for digital business solutions/technologies that can develop advanced functionalities engulfed cum interactive web solutions to cater to the on-growing needs of modern businesses globally.

One of the most demanding web development technologies i.e. AngularJS is used at a large scale today among different industry verticals. Moreover, it can develop any kind of web application as well as custom frontend solutions at ease.

That’s why businesses in 2022 look for highly reliable and the best AngularJS development companies for their custom web app development requirements. Being surrounded by a lot of web development companies, it becomes a tough task for many business owners/CEOs to pick the reliable one.

Do remember: Selection of the top Angular JS development company is the first step towards your business success and invertio always been the foremost choice for enterprises who wants to hire angular developer

So, let’s start your business success journey with the right choice. Here, I have listed all the parameters that I took before presenting this sorted collection of top AngularJS development companies to you.

  • Deeply analyzed each company’s portfolio
  • Checked the online reviews & ratings
  • Checked their testimonials & respective workfolio
  • Took note of their technical expertis
  • Latest technologies they use to work
  • Complete history check on each company
  • Web apps developed in each industry vertical

 

Find the refined list of top AngularJS development companies for your next web app development project:

1) PIXELCRAYONS

Avg. Hourly Rate: $12-30/hr

Established In: 2004

Employees Count: 250 – 999

Top 5 Clients: Vodafone, Puma, eBay, HP, NEXT

PixelCrayons is one of the top Angular development companies offering a wide range of Angular development services. With years of expertise and a team of skilled Angular developers, they provide custom Angular development, UI/UX design, cross-platform web app development, migration and upgradation services, Angular consulting, and round-the-clock support and maintenance.

Known for their commitment to quality, they ensure secure, scalable, and feature-packed web applications. PixelCrayons promises faster delivery, cost-saving solutions, and strict adherence to NDA terms for complete privacy. They have gained the trust of startups and Fortune 500 companies alike, making them a reliable choice for businesses seeking top-notch Angular development services.

Reviews:-

Case Study (In Brief):-

PixelCrayons stands out as a top Angular development company with its comprehensive approach and expert team. With a proven track record of delivering quality work, PixelCrayons is the ideal choice for businesses seeking reliable and efficient Angular web app development services.

Why partner with this AngularJS development company in 2024?

PixelCrayons is a leading AngularJS development company in India.

-> 19+ YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

-> 2,500+ SATISFIED CUSTOMERS

-> 4,200 + PROJECTS LAUNCHED

-> 97%+ CLIENT RETENTION

-> NO CONTRACT LOCK-INS

Looking to Hire Dedicated Developers From invertio

Get free consultation and let us know your project idea to turn it into an amazing digital product.

Talk To Our Experts

Angular developers at invertio (one of the most reliable Angular development companies in India) are competent to offer robust web apps that specifically and efficiently address your business challenges. You can Hire Angular Developer online on a monthly, hourly, or full-time basis.

Reviews:- 

Case Study (In Brief):-

invertio has successfully done 4500+ projects for various clients around the world. They provide immense support to their clients from start to project completion. Some of their amazing work samples are shown below:

Why partner with this AngularJS development company in 2022?

Leading AngularJS development company in India

-> 2,500+ SATISFIED CUSTOMERS

Being one of the leading Angular Development Companies, they have helped French unicorn startup BlaBlaCar expand to 27 markets worldwide, developed a Customer Portal MVP for global renewable energy giant Sonnen, and in less than six weeks, developed an e-commerce platform that is changing the MENA economy.
